job.title: Front-End Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description:
At ASM we build best-in-class products for health care administration and quality assurance. We use the latest technology to provide products to over 1,200 health care organizations worldwide. Founded in 1982 we have developed a great team to build great products.
Design with a fast, simple UI is one of the key selling points for our products. In this role, you will help build new features and products. You will primarily working in React building components for both our component library and user-facing applications. When necessary you will aid in designing and building APIs to connect to the front-end. You will need to rely on an understanding of visual design, UX, and front-end technologies to craft changes that have an impact.
You understand the importance of user experience and front-end technologies. You empathize with the struggles of end-users and advocate on their behalf. You get excited solving design challenges with other developers, building reusable components, and then continuing to improve those designs and components.
We offer everything you'd expect from a successful and established software company.
